name: Puzzle Games - 10 Party Boards Pro
description:
••• 10 Puzzle games ••••

• Blackbox : A number of balls are hidden in a rectangular arena. You have to deduce the positions of the balls by firing lasers positioned at the edges of the arena and observing how their beams are deflected.
• Dominosa :
• Bridges : You have a set of islands distributed across the playing area. Each island contains a number. Your aim is to connect the islands together with bridges, in such a way that.
• Sixteen
• Filling
• Guess
• LightUp
• Magnetic

Easy to play and hard to master.
